mapper.select: SELECT c.id , c.card_no as cardNo, c.password, c.status, c.type, cy.name as typeName, a.id as agentId, a.name as agentName, cs.id as customerId, cs.name as customerName, cs.phone_number as customerPhone, c.active_time as activeTime, c.used_time as usedTime, p.id as policyId, p.holder, p.holder_id_no as holderIdNo, p.holder_address as holderAddress, p.holder_gender as holderGender, p.holder_occupation as holderOccupation, p.holder_phone as holderPhone, p.recognizee, p.recognizee_id_no as recognizeeIdNo, p.recognizee_phone as recognizeePhone, p.start_time as policyStartTime, p.end_time as policyEndTime, p.holder_recognizee_relation as holderRecognizeeRelation, p.create_time as policyCreateTime, p.export_status as policyExportStatus FROM card c left join card_type cy on cy.id = c.type left join agent a on a.id = c.agent_id left join customer cs on cs.id = c.customer_id left join policy p on p.card_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{cardId}
